name: shoptoolscypress
description: Test Cases to test functionality of shoptools website

scripts.allure:report: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.allure:clear: if exist allure-results rmdir /q /s allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /q /s allure-report && if exist cypress\screenshots rmdir /q /s cypress\screenshots && if exist cypress\videos rmdir /q /s cypress\screenshots
scripts.test: npm run cy:run || npm run posttest && npm run pretest

author: Tarun
